Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Annunciation and the 29th of the Coptic Month:

Text.Language: Afrek niv/oui n~te niv/oui: afi~ e~y~m/tra n~]paryenoc: aferrwmi m~penr/]: saten v~nobi m~mauatf
He bowed the heavens of the heavens and came to the Virgin’s womb, became Man like us, except for our sin only.
طأطأ سماء السموات وأتى إلى بطن العذراء وصار إنساناً مثلنا ما خلا الخطية وحدها.
All/louia: all/louia: all/louia. I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~V] af[icarx e~bolqen ]paryenoc: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia. Jesus Christ, the Son of God, was incarnate of the Virgin, save us and have mercy upon us.
الليلويا الليلويا الليلويا: يسوع المسيح ابن الله تجسد من العذراء ، خلصنا وارحمنا.
